original_title: Bobby Vinton - Song From My Heart
overview: A multi-talented musician, singer & actor. He has sold more than 75 million albums during his career. In this full-stage musical gala, he pulls out all the stops to entertain fans at his Blue Velvet Theater in Branson, Missouri. He is joined by an orchestra, dance troupe & family members to sing all his most beloved hits and many more favorites.
title: Bobby Vinton - Song From My Heart
